attributes.review: This app is bad like the person beside me said that it took days to download I did not experience that. It took over a month to download! Then it was going good but it just all fell apart  seriously I lost all my photos, almost my apps were deleted and it changed some of my settings! Never download this app!
attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: This app is horrible. The service on the app is so very slow and it’s honestly very hard to navigate. I was expecting much more from this app, as it was recommended to me by many. This app is the worst and it does not give the energy I was expecting nor does it meet my expectations! Do better.
attributes.title: This app is the worst.

attributes.review: Not only did it take 6 hours too download, but once it downloaded my phone stopped working, it became slower and slower before finally completely glitching it would go to my contacts and call random people i could hear talking from the speaker. Do not Download! DONT DO IT!
attributes.title: This app is awful

attributes.review: Awful it’s terrible trash not good like takes forever to download and then I have to write my email address and that’s to much work like come on this app needs to be deleted forever and never make another one like this it’s just trash takes forever 😤😤😤😡😡😡🤬😡🤬😠😡 take this app away
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app took absolutely FOREVER to download AND when it finally did, it asked me to send a picture of my exposed breasts as a donation??? When i clicked no, it showed millions of pictures of child pornography with the statement “support Trump 2020”. I was APPALLED and immediately uninstalled the app. I had high expectations for you Trump, but you are just as disgusting as they say.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: after the second i put in my phone number i immediately got hacked and now i have to get a new phone number and that old one was passed down to me from my sweet grandmother. i am outraged. DONT EVER GET THIS HORRIBLE APP. i even have to get a new email too and new social media accounts because it hacked my whole phone. NOW I HAVE TO RESTART SUBWAY SURFERS 😡😤🤬😡😖👿.
attributes.userName: very very bad bad app app
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤢

attributes.review: Downloaded it an couldn’t find anything, after searching for 20 minutes my phone locked me out and I had to go to a iPhone repair store to get it factory reset making me lose everything I had on my phone up to 8 years old. Really disappointed!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Wow this app is the WORST EVER! Please don’t get it trust me. It glitches out so much and is a waste of time. Trust me I’m being nice in rating it one star but if I could put -1 I would😌 Just don’t get the app it’s so disappointing and trash like our President😘🤩
attributes.title: Dissapointed🧚🏻‍♂️🤢👺

attributes.review: The app is only available in the USA, causing less people to give you a one star review, this app literally killed both my cat and my guinea pig, it even made my dog run away as soon as I downloaded it. Not to mention how bad the app smelled, it was like pedophelia and rapists and we don’t like that candle sent in my house. 1/5 don’t download
